## Correlation Analysis

Load the Data

```{r}
library(readxl)
data_corr <- read_excel("data_corr.xlsx")
```

```{r}
library(AgroR)
```

```{r}
corgraph(data_corr[4:10],axissize = 9, legendsize = 9, size.tile.lty = .3, size.label.cor = .3)
```

```{r}
library(metan)
```

```{r}
plot(corr_coef(data_corr[4:10]))
```

```{r}
library(Path.Analysis)
```

```{r}
corr_plot(data_corr[4:10])
```
